name: 楊詠荍
objective: This is an introductory course of physics for engineers. The goal is to provide the students with the theoretical background and basic case-studies.  This includes, electromagnetisms, optical and mechanics.  At the same time will include basic modern concepts such as wave-particle duality and atomic and molecular structures as foundations for the following years.
schedule:
Introduction to the course
Optics and its importance
Optics - Geometric 
Optics - Diffractions
Electromagnetism - introduction
Electromagnetism
Electromagnetism
Mid term exam
Mechanics - introduction
Mechanics
Solid Mechanics
Solid Mechanics
Final exam
